tweets.tweet_text: Empty late-night gym. Just me and the squat rack. Leggings soaked, clinging to every curve. Thighs shaking, glutes on fire. Won’t stop till that deep ache throbs between my legs too. Good boys watch mommy finish her set… then beg for the real workout.
